cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Lincoln Town Car with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This smooth ride is the epitomy of class. All decked out in the best upgrades available. Only 50,000 miles on it.
This ride has well over 150,000 miles but we guarentee at least triple that.You won't regret taking  chance on this.
